metadata.project_title: AI Heroes - The Final Punch Setup
metadata.target_audience: Tech professionals, superhero fans, general audience
metadata.visual_style: Modern cinematic with comic book elements
metadata.color_grading: Vibrant heroic with professional corporate undertones

location.specific_location: Modern glass building entrance, open plaza area

scenes.action_description: The four superheroes stride purposefully toward the center of the plaza from different directions. **They are all moving at a standard walking pace.** Superman approaches from the left, cape flowing. Hulk walks normally from the right. Spiderman walks briskly from the foreground right. Batman walks methodically from the background left. They converge at the center of the plaza.

blocking.Superman: Enters frame left, walking with determination, chest forward, cape billowing behind. Standard standing and walking posture.
blocking.Hulk: Enters frame right, walking with a heavy but standard step. Standard standing and walking posture. Arms relaxed at sides.
blocking.Spiderman: Enters frame foreground right, walking with youthful, energetic steps. Standard standing and walking posture.
blocking.Batman: Enters frame background left, walking with a measured, tactical pace. Standard standing and walking posture.

camera_direction.shot_type: Wide establishing shot transitioning to medium group shot
camera_direction.camera_movement: Slow circular dolly movement clockwise around the converging heroes
camera_direction.angle: Eye level, gradually lowering to slightly low angle

lighting.key_light: Natural golden hour sunlight from 45-degree angle
lighting.back_light: Strong rim lighting from setting sun creating silhouette edges

visual_effects: Subtle light lens flares from sun
scenes.transition_out: Smooth speed ramp to slow motion

location.specific_location: Center of plaza, heroes in tight formation

scenes.action_description: **SLOW MOTION BEGINS (40% speed).** The four heroes reach toward the center simultaneously. Superman, Hulk, Spiderman, and Batman's hands meet and stack one upon another in a powerful gesture of unity.

blocking.Superman: Right hand extended palm down, steady and confident
blocking.Hulk: Large green hand placed over Superman's, controlled strength
blocking.Spiderman: Left hand placed energetically on top
blocking.Batman: Right hand tops the stack, authoritative placement

camera_direction.shot_type: Close-up on hands transitioning to medium close-up of faces
camera_direction.camera_movement: Slow push-in dolly toward stacked hands, then tilt up to faces
camera_direction.angle: Low angle emphasizing power and heroism
camera_direction.focus_technique: Rack focus from hands to faces

lighting.key_light: Golden hour sunlight creating warm glow on hands and faces
lighting.back_light: Strong rim light creating hero glow around heads

dialogue.audio_cues: Slow motion whoosh effects, dramatic musical build, fabric and leather sounds

visual_effects: Slow motion particle effects around hands
Subtle energy glow where hands meet

location.specific_location: Center of plaza, heroes breaking into pose

scenes.action_description: **SLOW MOTION CONTINUES (40% speed).** The heroes break their hand stack and simultaneously move into their signature, powerful hero poses, forming a dynamic tableau against the building. All faces show determination and confidence.

blocking.Superman: Center-left, classic superhero stance, fists on hips, cape flowing
blocking.Hulk: Right, arms raised in flex, showing power
blocking.Spiderman: Front-center low, dynamic crouch, web-shoot gesture
blocking.Batman: Left, cape spread wide, commanding stance

camera_direction.shot_type: Wide hero shot capturing all four characters
camera_direction.camera_movement: Slow continuing push-in, then slight crane up for elevated perspective
camera_direction.angle: Low angle (camera looking up at heroes) emphasizing power
camera_direction.camera_speed: Slow motion (40% speed) with slight speed ramp

lighting.key_light: Dramatic golden hour backlight creating silhouettes with edge lighting
lighting.back_light: Strong rim lighting on all heroes creating separation from background

lines.audio_processing: Slight reverb for epic quality, chorus effect for unison

dialogue.audio_cues: Cape swooshes, Hulk's roar undertone, musical crescendo

visual_effects: Enhanced slow motion with speed ramping
Dramatic cape physics for Superman and Batman
Color enhancement for each hero's signature color
scenes.transition_out: Speed begins to ramp for freeze frame preparation

location.specific_location: Center of plaza, heroes in final pose

scenes.action_description: **FREEZE FRAME ACTIVATED.** The heroes lock into their final hero pose at the peak of their power stance. The image freezes in a comic book style panel effect. The final dialogue is completed during this frozen moment.

blocking.Superman: Frozen in classic pose, confident. **Final position: Standing tall in the center-left of the frame, fists on hips.**
blocking.Hulk: Frozen mid-roar, arms flexed. **Final position: Standing powerfully on the right side of the frame, arms raised, slightly forward of Superman.**
blocking.Spiderman: Frozen in dynamic crouch, web-shooting gesture held. **Final position: Low to the ground, center-front, in an athletic crouch, one hand extended towards the camera.**
blocking.Batman: Frozen in commanding stance, cape at full spread. **Final position: Standing on the left side of the frame, slightly behind Superman, cape dramatically spread wide.**

lighting.key_light: Locked golden hour lighting with enhanced contrast

lines.audio_processing: Full reverb, epic echo, chorus effect, slight distortion for power on 'AI'

dialogue.audio_cues: Freeze frame sound effect, dramatic hit, reverb tail, sustained music chord

visual_effects: Motion blur trails frozen in place
Signature color glows for each hero

creative_notes.director_vision: This scene is the culmination of the heroes' unity, set against a modern corporate backdrop to emphasize the AI/technology theme. The walk-in must be standard and purposeful, allowing the drama to build during the slow-motion unity moment and climactic freeze frame.
